summary: "The Andy Griffith Show" was a popular American TV sitcom that aired on CBS from 1960 to 1968. It starred Andy Griffith as Sheriff Andy Taylor in the fictional town of Mayberry, North Carolina. The show featured his deputy Barney Fife, aunt Bee, and son Opie. With 249 episodes, it was a hit, never ranking lower than 7th in Nielsen ratings and ending at number one. The show won six Emmys for its co-stars. It spawned a spin-off and a reunion movie. After Griffith left, the show continued as "Mayberry, R.F.D." Reruns are still shown on various channels, and the complete series is available on DVD, Blu-ray, and streaming services.
title: The Andy Griffith Show
